explanation: Funds are required for reimbursement of repair services, supplies, equipment, transportation costs, and training provided to Taiwan or identified and notified to Congress through this reprogramming action for provision to Taiwan in support of the international effort to deter conflict in the Indo-Pacific region. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
